title: PortXFolio
description:
About the challenge
 
 
PortXFolio is a unique hackathon that challenges participants to create innovative, creative, and functional portfolios. Whether you’re a developer, designer, writer, or artist, your portfolio is your digital identity—a showcase of your skills, personality, and work.
This hackathon pushes you to think beyond traditional designs and build something truly unique and engaging. From interactive layouts to dynamic content, this is your chance to craft a portfolio that stands o
